abstract: A system for teaching compositionality to convolutional neural networks includes an unmasked convolutional neural network comprising a first set of convolutional neural network layers; a first masked convolutional neural network comprising a second set of convolutional neural network layers; the unmasked convolutional neural network and the first masked convolutional network sharing convolutional neural network weights; the system training the unmasked and first masked convolutional neural networks simultaneously based on an objective function that seeks to reduce both discriminative loss and compositional loss.
summary: <SOH> BRIEF DESCRIPTION OF THE FIGURES <EOH>FIG. 1A is an example diagram view of a convolutional neural network; FIG. 1B is an example diagram view of weights of a convolutional neural network; FIG. 2A is a diagram view of a system of an invention embodiment; FIG. 2B is a diagram view of a system of an invention embodiment; FIG. 3A is an example view of a first penalty mask generation scheme; FIG. 3B is an example view of a second penalty mask generation scheme; and FIG. 4 is a chart view of a method of an invention embodiment. detailed-description description="Detailed Description" end="lead"?
title: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR TEACHING COMPOSITIONALITY TO CONVOLUTIONAL NEURAL NETWORKS
